title: Start
body:
<<outfit Aig Casual>> 
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<outfit Lee Casual>>
<<expression Lee Neutral>>
<<move Lee StageRight2>><<move Aig StageLeft2>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Hey Aigburth, you got a minute?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Happy>>
Yeah!
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Listen, I think you might need to work a little harder.
Our debut is coming up soon, and it doesn't seem like you're putting in as much effort as you should be in your training...
->I'll work harder.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Neutral>>
    I know. I'll do my best starting tomorrow!
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Okay. As long as you're taking it seriously.
->It was just a bad day.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Neutral>>
    Yeah...it was just a bad day for me.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    I get that, but this is a crucial time for us.
    There's a lot riding on this debut concert.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Okay.
->I do what a want.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Angry>>
    I do what I want! Besides, I fully intend to just coast through life on my good looks alone.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<statDown Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Angry>>
    Hey! Do you know how many boy bands there are? Do you know how many of them are just as, if not MORE good-looking than us?
    Besides, if you want to capatalize on your looks, you should at least put effort into it. Do you think I haven't noticed you skimping on your skincare routine.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    What? I slap on some face cream like, once a week.  That's enough, right?
    <<flip Lee>>
    <<name Friendship ...>>
    <<statDown Friendship Lee>>
    Lee shudders visibly.
    <<flip Lee>>
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    We'll talk about...THAT...another time.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee Neutral>>
We need to work hard--for ourselves, and for...
<<name Friendship ...>>
His sentence trails off there, but you know who he's talking about.
<<flip Lee>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
The two of you glance at the top right bunk, empty save for a wreath and several candles.
